# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.x2APIC property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

x2APIC feature. A value of true indicates that the processor supports x2APIC feature.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: x2APIC
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

public static IPropertyKey x2APIC { get; }
